english.segment1: I don't know the ocean's crystal blue, and I don't climb the mountains for the view. Or wish upon the stars above my head, or bear witness to a marvelous sunset
english.segment2: But the very thought of things I've never seen, Is all it takes to bring me to my knees.
english.segment3: (chorus). Oh what a wonderful wonder, A display of great beauty and power. Oh what a wonderful wonder. You are to me
english.segment4: I wish that I could see life through your eyes. To gaze upon the canvas from your side. To understand all that you've done before. And to realize the plans you have in store.
english.segment5: And when I long to know what I don't see. You give me the courage to believe.
english.segment7: I can hardly wait until the time. when you will turn my darkness into light. and I'll finally find my way to heaven's door. where I won't need my faith anymore.
english.segment8: And when my eyes behold your majesty. I'll join with the angels and we'll sing
